title: Path Traversal
description:
A web application serves files using this URL pattern:

https://example.com/view?file=report.pdf

The server code:
```php
$file = $_GET['file'];
readfile("/var/www/uploads/" . $file);
```

Craft a path traversal payload to read /etc/passwd. How many directories do you need to go up from /var/www/uploads/ to reach the root (/)?

Submit the payload: flag{payload} (just the file parameter value)
hints: From /var/www/uploads/, you need to go up 3 directories to reach /
Each ../ goes up one directory: uploads → www → var → /
Then append etc/passwd to read the target file
